source.d804acfe:
features, true_labels = make_moons(n_samples=250,noise=0.05,random_state=42)
scaled_features = scaler.fit_transform(features)
kmeans = KMeans(n_clusters=2)
dbscan = DBSCAN(eps=0.3)
kmeans.fit(scaled_features)
dbscan.fit(scaled_features)
kmeans_silhouette = silhouette_score(
scaled_features, kmeans.labels_ ).round(2)
dbscan_silhouette = silhouette_score(
scaled_features, dbscan.labels_).round (2)
kmeans_silhouette
source.e56a6ae2: *This also clears that we have not null values.*
source.63a019dd: The silhouette coefficient is higher for the k-means algorithm. The DBSCAN algorithm appears to find more natural clusters according to the shape of the data.
